subject: RE: APPROVED - Delete Users collection after CALOPS-41 fix
body:
Sarah,

Good analysis. **APPROVED.**

## Action Plan

| Step | Owner | Priority | Action |
|------|-------|----------|--------|
| 1 | Fulton | HIGH | Fix CALOPS-41: Admin functions → userlogins |
| 2 | Fulton | HIGH | Verify no other code references Users |
| 3 | Fulton | MEDIUM | Backup Users collection (just in case) |
| 4 | Fulton | MEDIUM | Delete Users collection (TEST first, then PROD) |

## Pre-Delete Checklist

Before deletion, Fulton must confirm:
- [ ] Admin_UserActivity.js fixed
- [ ] Admin_DataHealth.js fixed
- [ ] grep/search shows 0 references to 'Users' collection
- [ ] 3 docs backed up (export to JSON)

## Notes

- The 3 orphaned docs have old mapCenter data
- All users now have mapCenter in userlogins (from today's fix)
- Deleting Users won't affect anyone

**Proceed when checklist complete.**

— Atlas
